alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 2:59AM CDT until April 11 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WEBSTER AND LACLEDE COUNTIES... At 258 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles west of Lebanon to Conway to near Marshfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lebanon... Bennett Spring State Park... Morgan... Conway... Phillipsburg... Stoutland... Twin Bridges... Rader... Sleeper... Dry Knob... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 106 and 109, and between mile markers 112 and 142. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
